Vulnerabilities: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in the galleryUrl parameter
SecurityMeasures: Input validation and sanitization of URL parameters

Steps.Description: Exploit the SSRF vulnerability in the galleryUrl parameter

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that by manipulating the galleryUrl parameter, they can access internal resources.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker sends a request to the web application with a crafted galleryUrl parameter pointing to the internal admin console: /gallery?galleryUrl=http://localhost:20011/admin
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully gains access to the admin console.
